channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Complete Digitization of Leonardo da Vinci's Codex Atlanticus
item.description:
His artis­tic projects were also exper­i­ments. As more and more of those note­books have become avail­able online, both Renais­sance schol­ars and laypeo­ple alike have learned con­sid­er­ably more about how Leonardo’s mind worked. See the com­plete dig­i­ti­za­tion of Leonardo’s Codex Atlanti­cus here.

Read more

item.title: I built the same app 10 times: Evaluating frameworks for mobile performance
item.description:
All next-gen frameworks feel instant. 36 times smaller than Next. 91 times smaller than TanStack Start with React.

Read more
